mapper.select: select id,name, failureTime, officeTime,convert(decimal(18,2),failureTime/officeTime*100) as rate from Equipmentstatus where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Equipmentstatus) order by name,id DESC

select name,sum(failureTime) as failureTime,sum(officeTime) as officeTime,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime)*100) as rate,date from Equipmentstatus where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Equipmentstatus) group by date,name

select sum(failureTime) as failureTime,sum(officeTime) as officeTime,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime)*100) as rate,date from Equipmentstatus where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Equipmentstatus) group by date
select id,name, failureTime, officeTime,convert(decimal(18,2),failureTime/officeTime*100) as rate from Equipmentstatus where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2} order by name,id DESC

select name,sum(failureTime) as failureTime,sum(officeTime) as officeTime,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime)*100) as rate from Equipmentstatus where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2} group by name

select Equipmentstatus.name as name,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime)*100) as rate,month(Equipmentstatus.date) as month from Equipmentstatus,Aim WHERE YEAR ( Equipmentstatus.date ) = #{date} and YEAR(Aim.date)=#{date} and Equipmentstatus.name=#{name} GROUP BY MONTH ( Equipmentstatus.date ),Aim.equipment ,Equipmentstatus.name

select Equipmentstatus.name as name,Aim.equipment as indicators,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime)*100) as yearRate from Equipmentstatus,Aim WHERE YEAR ( Equipmentstatus.date ) = #{date} and YEAR(Aim.date)=#{date} and Equipmentstatus.name =#{name} GROUP BY Aim.equipment ,Equipmentstatus.name
